name: imagia
description: Imagia - AI-powered app builder with marketing generation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker:build" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/backend && npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile src/db/knexfile.js
scripts.db:rollback: cd packages/backend && npx knex migrate:rollback --knexfile src/db/knexfile.js
scripts.db:seed: cd packages/backend && npx knex seed:run --knexfile src/db/knexfile.js
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd packages/backend && npm run lint" "cd packages/frontend && npm run lint"
